csdl.jupiter.file
Class FileResource

java.lang.Object
  csdl.jupiter.file.FileResource

public class FileResource
extends java.lang.Object

Provides a way to create a review file.

Version:
$Id: FileResource.java,v 1.30 2005/03/26 07:15:19 takuyay Exp $
Author:
Takuya Yamashita

Method Detail

setSelectedResource

public static void setSelectedResource(org.eclipse.core.resources.IResource resource)
Sets selected file and selected project from the file.

Parameters:
resource - the active resource.

createIFile

public static org.eclipse.core.resources.IFile createIFile(org.eclipse.core.resources.IProject project,
                                                           java.lang.String relativePath,
                                                           boolean isReviewFile)
                                                    throws java.io.IOException,
                                                           org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException,
                                                           ReviewException
Gets file instance from the given project and the relative path to the review file to be created. Returns null if problems occur on the new file creation.

Parameters:
project - the active project.
relativePath - the relative path to the review file to be created.
isReviewFile - sets true if the creating file is review file. sets false otherwise.
Returns:
the file instance which is guaranteed to exist unless null is returned.
Throws:
org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException - thrown if problems occur.
java.io.IOException - thrown if problems occur.
ReviewException - thrown if problems occur.

createIFile

public static org.eclipse.core.resources.IFile createIFile(org.eclipse.core.resources.IFile iFile,
                                                           boolean isReviewFile)
                                                    throws java.io.IOException,
                                                           org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException,
                                                           ReviewException
Creates IFile instance from the File. Sets true if the file is review file. Sets false otherwise.

Parameters:
iFile - the iFile
isReviewFile - Sets true if the file is review file. Sets false otherwise.
Returns:
the iFile
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if problems occur.
org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException - if problems occur.
ReviewException - if problems occur.

getPathToReviewFile

public static java.lang.String getPathToReviewFile(org.eclipse.core.resources.IProject project,
                                                   ReviewId reviewId,
                                                   ReviewerId reviewerId)
Gets the relative file name to the review XML file. Returns null if the review id is not contained in the list of config file. Throws the IllegalArgumentException if at least either project, reviewId, or reviewerId, or both.

Parameters:
project - the project.
reviewId - the review id.
reviewerId - the reviewer id.
Returns:
the relative file name to the review XML file. Returns null if the review id is not contained in the list of config file.

getReviewFile

public static org.eclipse.core.resources.IFile getReviewFile(org.eclipse.core.resources.IProject project,
                                                             ReviewId reviewId,
                                                             ReviewerId reviewerId)
Gets the review IFile instance of the XML file. The project, review id, and reviewer id determines an unique review file. Returns null if either project, reviewId, or reviewerId is null, or if the review id is not contained in the list of config file.

Parameters:
project - the project.
reviewId - the review id.
reviewerId - the reviewer id.
Returns:
the review IFile instance of the XML file. Returns null if either project, reviewId, or reviewerId is null, or if the review id is not contained in the list of config file.

getPathToReviewFolder

public static java.lang.String getPathToReviewFolder(org.eclipse.core.resources.IProject project,
                                                     ReviewId reviewId)
Gets the relative review folder. Returns null if the review id is not contained in the list of config file.

Parameters:
project - the project.
reviewId - the review id.
Returns:
the relative review folder. Returns null if the review id is not contained in the list of config file.

getSelectedProject

public static org.eclipse.core.resources.IProject getSelectedProject()
Gets the selected IProject instance regardless of an active file or not. In other words, it is not affected by the active file. Returns null if there is no selected project.

Returns:
the selected IProject instance

getActiveProject

public static org.eclipse.core.resources.IProject getActiveProject()
Gets the active IProject instance, whose file is active. The active project means the project to which an active editor belongs. Returns null if an active editor does not exist and any project is not opened yet, or IFileEditorInput instance does not exist (meaning the case that welcome page is opened, for example).

Returns:
the IProject instance. null if an active editor does not exist or IFileEditorInput instance does not exist (meaning the case that welcome page is opened, for example).

getProject

public static org.eclipse.core.resources.IProject getProject(org.eclipse.core.resources.IResource iResource)
Gets the IProject instance from the given IResource instance, which belongs to the project.

Parameters:
iResource - the the IResource instance.
Returns:
the IProject instance. null if the passing parameter is null.

getProject

public static org.eclipse.core.resources.IProject getProject(java.lang.String projectName)
Gets the IProject instance from the project name string.

Parameters:
projectName - the project name string.
Returns:
the IProject instance.

getSelectedIFile

public static org.eclipse.core.resources.IFile getSelectedIFile()
Gets the selected IFile instance. Returns null if selected file does not exist (i.e. selection changed was not called before) nor an active editor does not exist (any editor part is not opened), nor active editor exists, but IFileEditorInput instance does not exist (i.e the case that welcome page is opened, for example).

Returns:
the IFile instance. Returns null if selected file does not exist (i.e. selection changed was not called before) nor an active editor does not exist (any editor part is not opened), nor active editor exists, but IFileEditorInput instance does not exist (i.e the case that welcome page is opened, for example).

getActiveFile

public static org.eclipse.core.resources.IFile getActiveFile()
Gets the active file which is active in the editor part.

Returns:
the active IFile instance.

getReviewIFiles

public static org.eclipse.core.resources.IFile[] getReviewIFiles(org.eclipse.core.resources.IProject project,
                                                                 ReviewId reviewId)
Gets the set of the IFile instances associated with the ReviewId instance in a project.

Parameters:
project - the project to search.
reviewId - the review ID instance which is associated with the files.
Returns:
the set of the review IFile instances associated with the review ID in the project.

getOpenedProjects

public static java.lang.String[] getOpenedProjects()
Gets the String array of the opened project names in workspace.

Returns:
the String array of the opened project names in workspace.

getOpenedAndReviewIdContainedProjects

public static java.lang.String[] getOpenedAndReviewIdContainedProjects()
Gets the String array of the opened and review ID contained project names in workspace.

Returns:
the String array of the opened and review ID contained project names in workspace.

goToLine

public static void goToLine(org.eclipse.core.resources.IFile targetIFile,
                            int lineNumber)
Links to the source code associated with the target file if any.

Parameters:
targetIFile - the target review file to open.
lineNumber - the line number of the target file.

remove

public static boolean remove(org.eclipse.core.resources.IFile[] iFiles)
Removes all IFile instances.

Parameters:
iFiles - the array of IFile instances.
Returns:
true if all files are removed successfully. false otherwise.
